description.translate: A thousand times he wandered to the ends of the world, and across the land he saw it.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Grande chute\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Mille fois, il s'égara aux confins du monde,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et par-delà les terres, il la vit.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7A thousand times he wandered to the ends\"}","{\"text\":\"§7of the world, and across the land he saw it.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§a1 §7HER§c-2\"}"]}}
